name: Ultramarine RS 24
description: Ultramarine RS 24 is a medium tinting strength, green shade Ultramarine blue. It is heat fast, lightfast, easy to disperse and approved worldwide for use in sensitive applications such as food contact plastics and cosmetics.Ultramarine RS 24 is widely used alone to obtain a bright, transparent shade of blue, or in combination with other pigments such as titanium dioxide, with which it gives an attractive pastel shade.Ultramarine RS 24 is intended as a general purpose pigment with applications in paint, ink, soap, cosmetics and many other industries, particularly those in which a high tinting strength is required.Ultramarine RS 24 can be used in plastics.
